summary: In 1945, a strange mix of Germans, military personnel and civilians, pro-Nazi and anti-Nazi, celebrities and escaped prisoners, converges at a lavish hotel in heavily-bombed Berlin.
cast: Faye Emerson|Helmut Dantine|Raymond Massey|Andrea King|Peter Lorre|Alan Hale|George Coulouris|Henry Daniell|Peter Whitney|Helene Thimig|Steven Geray|Kurt Kreuger|Ruth Albu|Frank Alten|Walter Bonn|Eddie Borden|Betty Chay|Pat Clark|Helen Dickson|Carl Ekberg|Fred Essler|Charles H. Stephenson|Margaret Story|Alfred Stury|George Suzanne|Richard Tyler|Lucy Von Boden|Hans von Morhart|John Wengraf|Leo White|Lottie Williams|Fred Wolff|Wolfgang Zilzer
title: Hotel Berlin
